meanings.sent1: The two metal pieces remained unwelded.
meanings.sent2: The unwelded parts easily came apart.
meanings.sent3: The unwelded pieces played a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: Her unwelded heart felt fragile and exposed.
meanings.sent5: The unwelded connection was weak and unreliable.

meanings.sent2: The unwelded seams allowed air to escape.
meanings.sent3: The unwelded puzzle pieces refused to fit together.
meanings.sent4: Their unwelded bond felt incomplete and uncertain.
meanings.sent5: The unwelded gate swung open with a creak.
